body_html:
Thanks @klappradla for taking care :)

Oh yes, I'm completely aware that this is hard to jump in. I'm still convinced these changes will fix the problem described above. I should take the time and do a little write-up to clarify and document the motivation behind these parts for you, the other maintainers, and also future-me 😬
